articles.title: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Rangers - Football Match Report - May 19, 2022 - ESPN India
articles.description: Get a report of the Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Rangers 2021-22 UEFA Europa League, Final football match.
articles.content:
Eintracht Frankfurt beat Rangers 5-4 on penalties on Wednesday in Seville to win the Europa League title and claim their first European trophy in 42 years.
